About me

E-Voting Based on Blockchain Technology

Developed a secure and transparent online voting system utilizing blockchain. This project aimed to address common voting challenges such as fraud, tampering, and lack of transparency. By leveraging the decentralized nature of blockchain, the system ensures immutable and verifiable voting records, enhancing trust and reliability in the electoral process.
